casebody.data:
In re S.J.M. No. 363A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 19, 2007. Beverly Basden, Sanford, for Lee County DSS. Susan J. Hall, Fayetteville, for Father. Elizabeth Boone, for GAL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of September 2007 by Respondent (Mother) for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (Mother) shall have up to and including the 24th day of October 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of September 2007."
